entries.name: error
entries.desc: Examine whether an option processing is failed.

entries.name: error?
entries.desc: Examine whether an option processing is failed.

entries.name: error_message()
entries.desc: Return the appropriate error message in POSIX-defined format. If no error has occurred, returns nil.

entries.name: get()
entries.desc: Get next option name and its argument, as an Array of two elements.

entries.name: ordering=(ordering)
entries.desc: Set the handling of the ordering of options and arguments. A RuntimeError is raised if option processing has already started.

entries.name: set_options(*arguments)
entries.desc: Set options. Takes the same argument as ::new.

entries.name: terminated?()
entries.desc: Returns true if option processing has terminated, false otherwise.
